DESCRIPTION: Remove a role to every member on the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: Allows you to remove a role from every single member on this server.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: This command requires you to have a role higher than the role you are trying to assign.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}rolefromall [@Role | Role ID | RoleName]** ~ Removes the role from everyone in the server.
USAGE: {{prefix}}rolefromall [@Role | Role ID | RoleName] [@Role | Role ID | RoleName]
ALIASES: Rolefromall does not have any aliases.
PATIENCE: Please wait while I remove the role {{role}} from {{amount}} members.
FILTER: Users who do not have the role {{role}} will be skipped.
TIME: This may take a while depending on how many members are affected.
SUCCESS: {{mention}}, All specified members have lost the role! Thank you for your patience.
MISSING_PERM: You do not have the permissions needed to remove roles or the role you are trying to remove is higher than your highest role.
NEED_VIP: This command will only work for a VIP server. To become a VIP, you must be nitro boosting our support server and use the vipregister command.
